FuncDef: The display vxlan cu-peer command displays the peer information of VXLAN tunnels in a CU separation scenario.
Examples: Vni ID    Source                  Destination            Type      Out Vni ID     Nqa State     Pkt Loss Ratio
ExtraInfo: To check the peer information of VXLAN tunnels in a CU separation scenario, run the display vxlan cu-peer command. The command output helps you determine whether VXLAN tunnels are created successfully.
